content: That's really helpful, thanks for the tips on grilling chicken breasts! I'll definitely try out that brine solution next time. And yeah, that massive gas grill at my cousin's place was really impressive - it was able to cook a ton of food quickly and evenly. I was actually thinking of trying out some Korean-style BBQ at home, have you got any recommendations for good marinades or sauces for bulgogi beef skewers?
